name: Sarah E. Zimmerman
text: Pizza Hut pizza has always been my favorite. This establishment didn't disappoint. Pizza was hot, fresh, and on point. Toppings were evenly distributed and not skimped. The staff that  interacted with us over the phone, and when the pizza was brought out to the car were cheerful and kind.
